body.bibl: Horn, Cornelia B. “Transgressing Claims to Sacred Space: The Strategic Advantage of the Portability of Relics for Antichalcedonians in Syria-Palestine in the Fifth and Sixth Centuries CE.” In Georgian Christian Thought and Its Cultural Context: Memorial Volume for the 125th Anniversary of Shalva Nutsubidze (1888-1969), edited by Tamar Nutsubidze, Cornelia B. Horn, and Basil Lourié, 45–68. Texts and Studies in Eastern Christianity 2. Leiden: Brill, 2014.
